casebody.data:
Mrs. N. J. SMITH et al., Appellants, v. R. P. DOROUGH, Trustee, Appellee.* No. 6021. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 24, 1930. J. Q. Mahaffey and C. E. Bryson, both of Texarkana, Tex. (H. A. O’Neal and Ben A. Harper, both of Atlanta, Tex., and John J. King and J. I. Wheeler, both of Texarkana, Tex., on the brief), for appellants. • Elmer L. Lincoln and S. I. Robison, both of Texarkana, Tex., for appellee.

Before BRYAN and FOSTER, Circuit Judges, and DAWKINS, District Judge.

Rehearing denied December 19, 1930.

 PER CURIAM.

The decree is affirmed.
